front.title: IPv6 Router Advertisement based DNS Autoconfiguration

abstract.t: This document specifies the steps a node takes in deciding how to autoconfigure its domain name per interface in IP version 6 and the address of recursive DNS server. The autoconfiguration process includes a node's creating a domain name for its global address, verifying the uniqueness of the name in the domain where it is placed and registering both the regular domain name and inverse domain name information of the node with DNS server automatically. Also, it autoconfigures the address of recursive DNS server for DNS name resolution.
